feed.title: GitHub R Daily Trending

entry.title: ursacomputing/crossbow
entry.summary:
Extra CI for Apache Arrow

Arrow Packaging Tasks

Nightlies

The nightly builds are submitted by cron jobs running as Github Actions cron jobs, see the github actions workflows defined in this repository.

For the triggered tasks see the nightly group of crossbow's task definition file.

Nightly report CSVs are stored on the csv_reports directory.
